alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 2:52PM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze and snow accumulations of up to one inch with up to 2 inches north of Route 28. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Hamilton Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to sleet and freezing rain after midnight then snow overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
